sentences.sContent: His nose also bore a long cut lengthwise.
sentences.sContent_eng: His nose also bore a long cut lengthwise.
sentences.sCn: 他的鼻腔也有一道纵向的长伤痕。

sentences.sContent: The four columns cost $60 each, and one was split lengthwise to make decorative pilasters for the porch.
sentences.sContent_eng: The four columns cost $60 each, and one was split lengthwise to make decorative pilasters for the porch.
sentences.sCn: 这四个柱子每个花了60美元，其中一根被纵向劈开，做为门廊的两根装饰柱。

sentences.sContent: If you have a live aloe vera plant in the house, cut the leaf lengthwise and remove the pulp - avoid the yellow juice near the leaf surface.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you have a live aloe vera plant in the house, cut the leaf lengthwise and remove the pulp - avoid the yellow juice near the leaf surface.
sentences.sCn: 如果你在家里养了芦荟，你可以纵向的切开它的叶子，把果肉切掉，注意不要移除叶子表面的黄色液汁。

words.tran: 长度，长；时间的长短；（语）音长

trans.tranOther: in the direction or position of the longest side
